flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour so 1 hour 20 minutes = (60+20) minutes = 83 minutes
He will spend a total of 83+10 = <<83+10=93>>93 minutes
93 minutes is = (60/60) hours and 33 minutes = 1 hour 33 minutes = 0130 in 24-hr time
He has to leave 0133 hours earlier than 0900 i.e. 0900-0133 = 0727 hours
#### 0727

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 83. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
